string-array.name: tableCreator
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE Admin (employeeId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, username TEXT, password TEXT, firstname TEXT, lastname TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Program (programCode INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, programName TEXT, tuitionFee NUMERIC, duration INTEGER, semester INTEGER);

CREATE TABLE Payment (paymentId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, studentId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, programCode INTEGER, totalAmount NUMERIC, amountPaid NUMERIC, balance NUMERIC, paymentDate INTEGER, status TEXT);
